name: Super Mario 64
description: A pioneering 3D platformer where Mario explores Princess Peach's castle to save her from Bowser.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: An epic adventure game where Link must save Princess Zelda and the land of Hyrule from the evil Ganondorf.

name: GoldenEye 007
description: A groundbreaking FPS based on the James Bond film, known for its engaging multiplayer mode.

name: Banjo-Kazooie
description: A colorful and whimsical 3D platformer starring the bear-and-bird duo Banjo and Kazooie.

name: Star Fox 64
description: An action-packed rail shooter that introduced the Rumble Pak accessory for the N64 controller.

name: Mario Kart 64
description: A fun and chaotic kart racing game featuring characters from the Mario franchise.

name: Paper Mario
description: A charming RPG featuring a unique, paper-thin version of Mario in a 3D world.

name: Donkey Kong 64
description: A challenging 3D platformer starring Donkey Kong and his friends, packed with collectibles.

name: Super Smash Bros.
description: A unique fighting game featuring an all-star roster of Nintendo characters.

name: Pokémon Stadium
description: A game that brought Pokémon battles to life in 3D and let players use their Game Boy Pokémon in battle.
